title: AFL: I'd like to see that [advertisement] 1994
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television advertising
abstract: Classic 1994 Australian Football League ad featuring international sportspeople.
description: Produced in 1994 to promote Australian Rules Football as a national game, this ad features international sportspeople Evander Holyfeld (boxer), Hakeem 'The Dream' Olajuwon (basketball player), Carl Lewis (runner), Sharron Davies (swimmer), John McEnroe (tennis player), Dean Richards (rugby player) and Ian Wright (soccer player). Produced by Campaign Palace.
